title: Linux cal Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the Linux cal command, learn its syntax, and practice using it to display calendars for the current month, specific years, and months.

meta.title: Linux cal Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the Linux cal command, learn its syntax, and practice using it to display calendars for the current month, specific years, and months.
meta.keywords: Linux, cal command, calendar, system management, system monitoring

steps.title: Understand the Purpose and Syntax of the cal Command

verify.name: Verify the current month's calendar is displayed
verify.hint: The `cal` command should display the calendar for the current month and year.

verify.name: Verify the current month's calendar is displayed
verify.hint: The `cal` command should display the calendar for the current month and year.

steps.title: Display the Calendar for a Specific Year or Month

verify.name: Verify the calendar for a specific month is displayed
verify.hint: The `cal 4 2023` command should display the calendar for April 2023.

verify.name: Verify the calendar for a specific year is displayed
verify.hint: The `cal 2024` command should display the calendar for the year 2024.
